channel.title: Banking and Finances on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Logo
Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited /dəˈlɔɪt ˈtuːʃ toʊˈmɑːtsuː/, commonly referred to as Deloitte, is a multinational professional services network. Deloitte is one of the “Big Four” accounting organizations and the largest professional services network in the world by revenue and number of professionals with headquarters in London, United Kingdom. Source About Deloitte “Deloitte” is the brand under which approximately 286,000 dedicated professionals in independent firms throughout the world collaborate to provide audit & assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax and related services to select clients.
You can download theDeloittelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Deloitte
item.description: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited /dəˈlɔɪt ˈtuːʃ toʊˈmɑːtsuː/, commonly referred to as Deloitte, is a multinational professional services network. Deloitte is one of the “Big Four” accounting organizations and the largest professional services network in the world by revenue and number of professionals with headquarters in London, United Kingdom. Source About Deloitte “Deloitte” is the brand under which approximately 286,000 dedicated professionals in independent firms throughout the world collaborate to provide audit & assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax and related services to select clients.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Fidelity Banking and Finances Logo Fidelity Banking and Finances Inc., commonly referred to as Fidelity, earlier as Fidelity Management & Research or FMR, is an American multinational financial services corporation based in Boston, Massachusetts. It is one of the largest asset managers in the world with $2.46 trillion in assets under management as of March 2018 and a combined total customer asset value number of $6.7 trillion. Fidelity Banking and Finances operates a brokerage firm, manages a large family of mutual funds, provides fund distribution and investment advice, retirement services, Index funds, wealth management, cryptocurrency, securities execution and clearance, and life insurance.
You can download theFidelity Investmentslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Fidelity Investments
item.description: Fidelity Banking and Finances Inc., commonly referred to as Fidelity, earlier as Fidelity Management & Research or FMR, is an American multinational financial services corporation based in Boston, Massachusetts. It is one of the largest asset managers in the world with $2.46 trillion in assets under management as of March 2018 and a combined total customer asset value number of $6.7 trillion. Fidelity Banking and Finances operates a brokerage firm, manages a large family of mutual funds, provides fund distribution and investment advice, retirement services, Index funds, wealth management, cryptocurrency, securities execution and clearance, and life insurance.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 SoftBank Group Logo
SoftBank Group Corp. is a Japanese multinational conglomerate holding company headquartered in Tokyo. The company owns stakes in Softbank Corp. (ja), Softbank Vision Fund (ja), Arm Holdings, Fortress Investment Group, Boston Dynamics, Sprint (85%), Alibaba (29.5%), Yahoo Japan (48.17%), Brightstar (87.1%), Uber (15%), Didi Chuxing (ca.20%), Ola (ca.30%), Renren (42.9%), InMobi (45%), Hike (25.8%), Snapdeal (ca.30%), Fanatics (ca.22%), Improbable Worlds (ca.50%), Paytm (ca.20%), OYO (42%), Ping An Insurance (7.41%), Slack Technologies (ca.
You can download theSoftbanklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
DBS Bank Logo
DBS Bank is a Singaporean multinational banking and financial services corporation headquartered in Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 3, Marina Bay, Singapore. The company was known as The Development Bank of Singapore Limited, before the present name was adopted on 21 July 2003 to reflect its changing role as a regional bank. Source
You can download theDBS Banklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: DBS Bank
item.description: DBS Bank is a Singaporean multinational banking and financial services corporation headquartered in Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 3, Marina Bay, Singapore. The company was known as The Development Bank of Singapore Limited, before the present name was adopted on 21 July 2003 to reflect its changing role as a regional bank. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Jefferies Group Logo
Jefferies Group LLC is an American multinational independent investment bank and financial services company that is headquartered in New York City. The firm provides clients with capital markets and financial advisory services, institutional brokerage, securities research, and asset management. This includes mergers and acquisitions, restructuring, and other financial advisory services. The Capital Markets segment also includes its securities trading (including the results of its indirectly partially owned subsidiary, Jefferies High Yield Trading, LLC) and investment banking activities.
You can download theJefferieslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Jefferies
item.description: Jefferies Group LLC is an American multinational independent investment bank and financial services company that is headquartered in New York City. The firm provides clients with capital markets and financial advisory services, institutional brokerage, securities research, and asset management. This includes mergers and acquisitions, restructuring, and other financial advisory services. The Capital Markets segment also includes its securities trading (including the results of its indirectly partially owned subsidiary, Jefferies High Yield Trading, LLC) and investment banking activities.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Mizuho Financial Group Logo
Mizuho Financial Group, Inc. ,abbreviated as MHFG, or simply called Mizuho, is a banking holding company headquartered in the Ōtemachi district of Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. The name “mizuho (瑞穂)” literally means “abundant rice” in Japanese and “harvest” in the figurative sense. Upon its founding, it was the largest bank in the world by assets. Source
You can download theMizuhologo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Mizuho
item.description: Mizuho Financial Group, Inc. ,abbreviated as MHFG, or simply called Mizuho, is a banking holding company headquartered in the Ōtemachi district of Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. The name “mizuho (瑞穂)” literally means “abundant rice” in Japanese and “harvest” in the figurative sense. Upon its founding, it was the largest bank in the world by assets. Source

 Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Logo

You can download theMUFGlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MUFG
item.description: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, Inc. (MUFG; 株式会社三菱UFJフィナンシャル・グループ, Kabushiki gaisha Mitsubishi Yūefujei Finansharu Gurūpu) is a Japanese bank holding and financial services company headquartered in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Nomura Holdings Logo
Nomura Holdings, Inc. is a Japanese financial holding company and a principal member of the Nomura Group. It, along with its broker-dealer, banking and other financial services subsidiaries, provides investment, financing and related services to individual, institutional and government customers on a global basis with an emphasis on securities businesses. Source
You can download theNomuralogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Nomura
item.description: Nomura Holdings, Inc. is a Japanese financial holding company and a principal member of the Nomura Group. It, along with its broker-dealer, banking and other financial services subsidiaries, provides investment, financing and related services to individual, institutional and government customers on a global basis with an emphasis on securities businesses. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation Logo
Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation is a Japanese multinational banking and financial services company headquartered in Yurakucho, Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. It is the second largest bank in Japan by assets and market capitalization (as of 2019). Along with MUFG and Mizuho, SMBC is referred to as a Japanese megabank, one of the three largest banks who dominate market share in Japan’s financial system. The bank is closely affiliated with Sumitomo and Mitsui keiretsu.
You can download theSMBClogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: SMBC
item.description: Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation is a Japanese multinational banking and financial services company headquartered in Yurakucho, Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. It is the second largest bank in Japan by assets and market capitalization (as of 2019). Along with MUFG and Mizuho, SMBC is referred to as a Japanese megabank, one of the three largest banks who dominate market share in Japan’s financial system. The bank is closely affiliated with Sumitomo and Mitsui keiretsu.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Suite LLC Logo
Founded in 2001, Suite delivers industry grade software and services to the financial services community. Suite customers include top-tier banks, data-providers, ECN’s/online trading platforms, outsourced service providers, hedge funds, and small community banks. Suite provide analytics for the pricing and risk management of fixed income cash products, fixed income derivatives and credit derivatives. Suite also provides customized software implementations, independent valuation services and portfolio stress testing. Source
You can download theSuitelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Suite
item.description: Founded in 2001, Suite delivers industry grade software and services to the financial services community. Suite customers include top-tier banks, data-providers, ECN’s/online trading platforms, outsourced service providers, hedge funds, and small community banks. Suite provide analytics for the pricing and risk management of fixed income cash products, fixed income derivatives and credit derivatives. Suite also provides customized software implementations, independent valuation services and portfolio stress testing. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Truist Financial Corp. Logo
Truist Financial Corp. is an American bank holding company headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina. The company was formed in December 2019 as the result of the merger of BB&T (Branch Banking and Trust Company) and SunTrust Banks. Its bank operates 2,049 branches in 15 states and Washington, D.C., and offers consumer and commercial banking, securities brokerage, asset management, mortgage, and insurance products and services. It is on the list of largest banks in the United States by assets.
You can download theTruistlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Truist
item.description: Truist Financial Corp. is an American bank holding company headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina. The company was formed in December 2019 as the result of the merger of BB&T (Branch Banking and Trust Company) and SunTrust Banks. Its bank operates 2,049 branches in 15 states and Washington, D.C., and offers consumer and commercial banking, securities brokerage, asset management, mortgage, and insurance products and services. It is on the list of largest banks in the United States by assets.

 CB Richard Ellis Logo
CBRE Group, Inc., is an American commercial real estate services and investment firm. The abbreviation CBRE stands for Coldwell Banker Richard Ellis. As of 2018, it is the largest commercial real estate services company in the world. Source Source
You can download theCBRElogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

 Citizens Financial Group Logo
Citizens Financial Group, Inc. is an American bank headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, which operates in the states of Connecticut, Delaware, Maine, Massachusetts, Michigan, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island and Vermont. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 N26 Bank Logo
N26 (known as Number 26 until July 2016) is a German direct bank, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. N26 offers its services throughout most of the Eurozone, UK, Switzerland and US. It is expected to start operating in Brazil soon. Source
You can download theN26logo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Y Combinator Logo
Y Combinator is an American seed accelerator which was launched in March 2005. Y Combinator is consistently ranked at the top of U.S. accelerators. Source

 Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Holdings (三井住友トラスト・ホールディングス株式会社) Logo
Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Holdings, Inc. is a Japanese financial holding company headquartered in Chiyoda, Tokyo. It provides an assortment of financial products to retail and wholesale customers, with a focus on asset management, financial brokerage and real estate services. Source
You can download theSumitomo Mitsuilogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
